title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 616.2 - Appropriate sources of reimbursement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 616.2 - Appropriate sources of reimbursement

State Regulations

Except as otherwise directed by the department or
required by law, reimbursement for assistance provided to refugees, entrants
and other persons not currently citizens of New York shall be claimed in a
manner that results in the least cost to the State, except when the department
approves alternate means of reimbursement for the assistance provided to such
individuals. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
616.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
